sentences.sContent: What amazed him even more than her appearance was her poise.
sentences.sCn: 比她的长相更让他惊讶的是她的沉着镇定。

remMethod.val: 在噪音 (noise) 中泰然自若 (poise)

words.tran: 泰然自若的，镇定的；平衡的，均衡的；摆好姿势不动的，静止的

trans.tranCn: 平衡， 均衡； 姿势； 镇静
trans.tranOther: If someone has poise, they are calm, dignified, and self-controlled
